full_summary:
## Contract Notice
### Phase Noise Analyzer Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01028618
**Solicitation Number:** 2022-12719
**Publication Date:** March 6, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** March 24, 2023 at 14:00:00

### Overview
The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of a Phase Noise Analyzer. The equipment will be used for signal quality measurement of a system in a laboratory environment, capable of operating in the HF frequency range (1 MHz - 200 MHz) and compatible for testing various signal sources used in HF radar systems.

### Scope
The proposed solution must meet the following requirements:

* Operate in the HF frequency range (1 MHz - 200 MHz)
* Be compatible with various signal sources used in HF radar systems
* Be capable of evaluating the components of a radar system presently under development, which operates down to 3 MHz

The Phase Noise Analyzer will be purchased as Minor Capital Equipment and may be used for evaluating other components in future Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) projects.

### Contact Information
For any inquiries, please contact:

* Susanne Hall
* Email: susanne.hall@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 343-553-2918

### Tender Documents
The tender documents, including the Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP), can be accessed at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/06/c77bcac353952d75c0dcd9c8dcd14fe9/2022-12719_notice_of_proposed_procurement_2_npp.pdf

### Procurement Category
The procurement category for this RFP is Good and Services (GD) with the specific NAICS code: N5985 - Antennas, Waveguides and Related Equipment.

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Geographic Location
The proposed Phase Noise Analyzer must be delivered to the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Please note that this is a competitive procurement and all interested suppliers must respond to the RFP in accordance with the instructions provided in the tender documents.** Ends.  # Phase Noise Analyzer # RFP # Tender Notification # Department of National Defence # Canada GunPolicy Error While PrintingIntialized gunReq201 isolate Tokens turn
